Package com.bsr.bitnicorm

package com.bsr.bitnicorm
  • Class
    Description
    Configure
    Root type for working with ORM
    IActionOrm
    If a class implements this interface, then an object of the class can catch events of inserting, changing, or deleting a record in the database only through iterations with the object on the client.
    IFunctionCallback<T>
    The interface Function callback.
    ISerializable
    A class marker that indicates that the class will be serialized in the database as a byte array.
    ISerializableJson
    A class marker that indicates that the class will be serialized in the database as a string value in the format json
    ISession
    Database work unit
    IUserType
    The interface User type.
    MapAppendCommandCreateTable
    This annotation allows you to execute a command after creating a table if it does not exist in the database.
    MapColumn
    fields of the type class marked with this annotation are projected into table columns, the column name will correspond to the name of the field of the type class
    MapColumnName
    fields of the type class marked with this annotation are projected into table columns, you must define the column name yourself
    MapColumnNotInsert
    MapColumnType
    If you are not satisfied with the type of the table column generated by the ORM, you can define the type yourself
    MapForeignKey
    Adds a row when creating a table with a foreign key
    MapIndex
    MapPrimaryKey
    Fields of the type marked with this annotation are projected into the table in the primary key column, the column name will correspond to the name of the field of the type
    MapPrimaryKeyName
    Fields of the type marked with this annotation are projected into the table in the primary key column, you should note the name of this column
    MapTable
    The type class marked with this annotation is projected into a table, the table name will correspond to the type class name.
    MapTableName
    The type class marked with this annotation is projected into a table; you must define the name of this table.
    MapWhere
    This annotation allows you to execute queries (getList, getListSelect, first, firstOrDefault, single, singleOrDefault,updateAll,deleteRows), with the where condition,Ð± the word 'where' is not required
    PairColumnValue
    A proxy class through which data is transferred for database updates, in the format: table column name - column value
    UtilsSerializable
    The type Utils serializable.
